00019 #include "MemMapFile.h"
00020 #include "MMDataSetDataWriter.h"
00021 #include "MMDataSetDataWriterTest.h"
00022 #include <windows.h>    // MemMapFile is windows only
00023 
00024 using namespace std;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00026 
00027 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( MMDataSetDataWriterTest );
00028 
00029 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::setUp()
00030 {
00031         // setup the DataSetHeader
00032         hdr = new DataSetHeader;
00033         hdr->AddUShortColumn(L"");
00034         hdr->AddFloatColumn(L"");
00035         hdr->SetRowCnt(50);
00036         hdr->SetDataStartFilePos(45);
00037 
00038         // Create the file, MMDataSetDataWriter assumes that the file is already created.
00039         MemMapFile mmfile;
00040         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00041         mmfile.Create(hdr->GetDataSize() + 45 + 100 /*extra*/);
00042         mmfile.Close();
00043 
00044         writer = new MMDataSetDataWriter(*hdr, "fred_flintstone");
00045 }
00046 
00047 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::tearDown()
00048 {
00049         delete writer;
00050         delete hdr;
00051         ::DeleteFile("fred_flintstone");
00052 }
00053 
00054 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::CreationTest()
00055 {
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::OpenTest()
00061 {
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00064 }
00065 
00066 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::CloseTest()
00067 {
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00070 }
00071 
00072 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::MapDataTest()
00073 {
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->MapData(40, 10));
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00077 }
00078 
00079 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::GetMappedDataPtrTest()
00080 {
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetMappedDataPtr());
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00084 }
00085 
00086 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::GetFirstRowMappedTest()
00087 {
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetFirstRowMapped() == 0);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->MapData(40, 10));
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetFirstRowMapped() == 40);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00093 }
00094 
00095 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::GetRowsMappedTest()
00096 {
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Open());
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetRowsMapped() == 50);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->MapData(40, 10));
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetRowsMapped() == 10);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->Close());
00102 }
00103 
00104 void MMDataSetDataWriterTest::GetMaxRowsToMapTest()
00105 {
00106         u_int32_t bytes = 200*1024*1024;
00107         int32_t maxRows = bytes/hdr->GetRowSize();
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer->GetMaxRowsToMap() == maxRows);
00109 }
